entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -34.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -39.1°C
Wind: S 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
